block.p: AVANEX, Fremont, Calif., named Paul Engle president and chief operating officer. As president, he succeeds Walter Alessandrini, chairman and chief executive. Mr. Engle was formerly vice president and general manager at the fiber optic communications division of Agilent Technologies.

DOLLAR THRIFTY AUTOMOTIVE GROUP, Tulsa, Okla., named Robert M. Barton to the new post of executive director for international sales for Dollar Rent A Car Systems. He had most recently been vice president for tour and travel at the Budget Group.

AVANEX, Fremont, Calif., named Paul Engle president and chief operating officer. As president, he succeeds Walter Alessandrini, chairman and chief executive. Mr. Engle was formerly vice president and general manager at the fiber optic communications division of Agilent Technologies.

DOLLAR THRIFTY AUTOMOTIVE GROUP, Tulsa, Okla., named Robert M. Barton to the new post of executive director for international sales for Dollar Rent A Car Systems. He had most recently been vice president for tour and travel at the Budget Group.

KMART, Troy, Mich., named Randy L. Allen to the new post of executive vice president for strategic planning and chief information officer. She had been a partner at Deloitte Consulting, specializing in retail.

PRODIGY COMMUNICATIONS, White Plains, named Charles Roesslein, president and chief executive, to the additional position of chairman. He succeeds Samer Salameh, who is leaving, but remains on the board.
